page.title: 14School Holidays,Sellindge
page.content: I am 11 years old,a boy,and live at number 1 Whitehall Way,Sellindge.We have six weeks holiday from school every summer from late July until the first week in September.My sister and I have to go to my Nan's each weekday because my parents both work from 9.00a.m. until 5.00p.m.As my Nan lives in the village,I can still go and play with my friends,so I usually go to Stone Hill or up to Southernay Lane where my friend Lee lives.His dad owns the village bakery and he has a big garden but sometimes we go across the fields to Mac's Farm.During the summer,my parents have 2 weeks holiday when we usually go away to somewhere like Brighton or have outings to London or Beaulieu.I am lucky enough to have a small swimming pool in my garden and spend a lot of time in that when my parents are at home.
